---
name: daisy-seed-core
description: Contains tools and documentation for developing the common core functionality of the DaisySeed Multi-Effect pedal project.
---

Build:

```sh
cd vst
cmake build
```

Run:

```sh
./build/DaisyMultiFX_artefacts/Release/Standalone/DaisyMultiFX.app/Contents/MacOS/DaisyMultiFX
```
